arStrings.szText: Cormond is heading to the ruins of Orbei Monastery in the Dry Steppes. He claims a cure for the Malignant may lie within. We shall see.
Cormond is heading to the ruins of Orbei Monastery in the Dry Steppes. He claims a cure for the Malignant may lie within. We shall see.
While clearing one of the Malignant tunnels, I discovered strange outgrowths. I should investigate them with proper tools. Perhaps Cormond has something at his workbench?
Craft a Brutal Malignant Invoker at Cormond's Workbench
Cormond will search the Orbei ruins for a cure but the Malignant have spread to the Dry Steppes. I must enter their lairs, fight them back... and buy Cormond time.
Defeat Malignant in the Ravening Pit
I crafted a tool called an “Brutal Malignant Invoker” at Cormond's workbench. I should travel to one of the nearby Malignant tunnels and revisit the outgrowths.
Use the Invoker on a Brutal Outgrowth
I crafted a tool called an “Brutal Malignant Invoker” at Cormond's workbench. I should travel to one of the nearby Malignant tunnels and revisit the outgrowths.
